result.longName: CVC Brasil Operadora e Agência de Viagens S.A.

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: CVC Brasil Operadora e Agência de Viagens S.A., together with its subsidiaries, provides tourism services in Brazil and internationally. It offers intermediation, airline tickets, land transportation, hotel and airline booking, ship cruise chartering, culture and professional exchange, and other tourism services. The company operates under the Trend Travel and VHC Hospitality brands in the United States of America; Almundo.com, Avantrip, Biblos, Quiero Viajes, and Ola brands in Argentina; and CVC brand in Argentina. It provides its tourism services directly to customers through independent service providers. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Santo André, Brazil.
